trans-unit.source: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料來源控制項，Web 伺服器控制項和其他控制項可以使用這個資料來源控制項來繫結程序至階層式網站地圖資料。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [簡介](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node)
trans-unit.target: [指定的開始節點](#specifying_the_starting_node)

trans-unit.source: [Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data)
trans-unit.target: [擷取網站導覽資料](#retrieving_site_map_data)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項是要儲存提供者站台對應，已針對您的站台的站台地圖資料的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>可讓 Web 伺服器控制項不特別網站瀏覽控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制項，將繫結至階層式網站地圖資料。

trans-unit.source: You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些 Web 伺服器控制項內容的資料表以顯示網站導覽或主動瀏覽的網站。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>控制項的設計特別為站台瀏覽控制項，因此不需要的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the Starting Node
trans-unit.target: 指定的開始節點

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>繫結至網站導覽資料並呈現其站台對應階層中指定的開始節點為基礎的檢視。

trans-unit.source: By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，它是階層的根節點，但它也可以在階層內任何節點。

trans-unit.source: The starting node is identified by the values of several <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> properties as follows:
trans-unit.target: 開始節點由數個值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>屬性，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Starting Node
trans-unit.target: 開始節點

trans-unit.source: Property Values
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).
trans-unit.target: 階層 （預設值） 的根節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> 為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is not set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> 未設定。

trans-unit.source: The node that represents the currently viewed page.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前檢視的頁面節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> 為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is not set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> 未設定。

trans-unit.source: A specific node of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 階層的特定節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> 為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>設定。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The negative or positive integer value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control.
trans-unit.target: 負數或正數的整數值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>識別層級向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始的節點數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>位移開始節點子樹狀結構的屬性公開資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設為負數*-n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是上階節點*n*上識別階層的層級開始節點。

trans-unit.source: If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 如果值*n*大於在階層樹狀結構的樹狀子目錄的起始節點的祖系層級數目是站台對應階層的根節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為正數 +*n*，公開的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是子節點*n*下所識別的起始節點層級。

trans-unit.source: Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 因為階層中可能存在多個分支的子節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>嘗試解析直接在識別的開始節點與代表目前要求的頁面上，如果可能的節點之間的路徑上的子節點。

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點，表示目前要求的頁面不是識別開始節點的值的子樹中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前要求的頁面節點是否小於*n*下識別開始節點目前要求的頁面節點層級做開始節點。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving Site Map Data
trans-unit.target: 擷取網站導覽資料

trans-unit.source: Site map data is retrieved from an <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> object, such as <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 站台地圖資料從擷取<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>物件，例如<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定任何已針對您的網站，以提供站台地圖資料的提供者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>，而且可以取得可用的提供者的清單，藉由存取<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: Like all data source controls, every instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view.
trans-unit.target: 所有資料來源控制項都，每個執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>單一協助程式物件，稱為資料來源檢視相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>根據資料來源的屬性，是在站台地圖資料上，檢視並呼叫擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> maintains the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> object that the controls bind to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>維護<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>控制項繫結至的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，開始的節點就是，在階層的根節點，但開始節點可以將任何節點。

trans-unit.source: The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position.
trans-unit.target: 起始點可以是相對於目前的位置在站台對應，或絕對位置的節點。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the starting node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定來指定開始節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>專門用於巡覽資料並不支援一般的資料來源作業，例如排序、 篩選、 分頁、 快取，或資料記錄的作業，例如更新、 插入或刪除。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 宣告式語法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a site map using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項以使用站台對應<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The site map data is retrieved beginning at the root node level.
trans-unit.target: 站台地圖資料會擷取從根節點層級。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出資料來源控制項是否包含資料來源檢視物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源控制項包含資料來源檢視物件集合，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A> property calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>屬性呼叫靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.ContainsListCollection%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>類別。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the starting node, specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: 開始節點的 URL，由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a single view on the site map data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> object according to the starting node and other properties of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 根據開始節點和資料來源的其他屬性，擷取 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> 物件之網站導覽資料的單一檢視。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> helper object on the site map data, starting with the node that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> or its child, if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 網站導覽資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> Helper 物件，從 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> 所識別的節點開始，如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，則為其子系。

trans-unit.source: No <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> is configured or available for the site.
trans-unit.target: 此站台未設定或者沒有可用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode" /> is <see langword="true" /> but the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，但已設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> is set but the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> cannot resolve a node for the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 已設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" />，但 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 無法解析指定 URL 的節點。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: 擷取可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項清單。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: 可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A> method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A>方法來擷取一組物件，可用來當作來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> objects.
trans-unit.target: 站台對應資料來源控制項封裝清單的資料做為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when associated with one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView> objects, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control represents a list source object and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A> method returns a list containing one element — the data source control itself.
trans-unit.target: 因此，與一或多個相關聯時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView>物件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項代表清單的來源物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A>方法會傳回包含一個元素的清單，資料來源控制項本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A> method calls the static <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetList%2A>方法會呼叫靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper.GetList%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來擷取可用來當做資料來源的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> checks whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a valid collection of view names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>會檢查是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>方法會傳回有效的檢視名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: If it does, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper> returns a list containing one element — the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 若是如此，<xref:System.Web.UI.ListSourceHelper>傳回包含一個元素的清單- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的資料來源檢視名稱。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a named view on the site map data of the site map provider according to the starting node and other properties of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 根據開始節點和資料來源的其他屬性，擷取網站導覽提供者之網站導覽資料的具名檢視。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> helper object on the site map data, according to the starting node that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> property or its child, if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 網站導覽資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> Helper 物件，根據 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> 屬性所識別的開始節點而定，如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，則為其子系。

trans-unit.source: The `viewName` parameter is the URL for the root node of the view, not the name of the data source view as it is with other data source controls that support named views.
trans-unit.target: `viewName`參數是檢視，而不是資料來源檢視的名稱的根節點的 URL，因為它是與其他資料來源控制項，以支援具名的檢視。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode" /> is <see langword="true" /> but the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，但已設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> is set but the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> cannot resolve a node for the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 已設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" />，但 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 無法解析指定 URL 的節點。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of named views for the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料來源控制項之具名檢視的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of named <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 由與 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 相關的具名 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> 物件組成的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> supports only one named view, the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames" /> method returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> with one <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 由於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 僅支援單一具名檢視，因此 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames" /> 方法會傳回含有 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 項目的 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a collection with one element (the default name) instead of `null` so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A> method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>方法會傳回含有一個項目 （預設名稱） 集合，而不是`null`以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> object that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與資料來源控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> that is associated with the data source control; otherwise, if no provider is explicitly set, the default site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 與資料來源控制項關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />，但如果未明確設定任何提供者，則為預設的網站導覽提供者。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider%2A> property to specify the site map provider instance to use with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.Provider%2A>屬性來指定要用於資料來源控制項的站台對應提供者執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance can be different than the provider that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A> property, if set.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體可以是不同的提供者，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A>屬性，如果設定。

trans-unit.source: The provider named by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider" /> 所命名的提供者無法使用。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
No default provider is configured for the site.
trans-unit.target: 此站台沒有設定預設的提供者。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the starting node is retrieved and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否擷取並顯示開始節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the starting node is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示開始節點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode%2A> property is evaluated during calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> methods, when the node tree that is returned by these methods is populated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode%2A>呼叫期間會評估屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>時節點樹狀目錄中的這些方法會傳回已填入的方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the site map provider that the data source binds to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料來源所繫結的網站導覽提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the site map provider that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> binds to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 所繫結的網站導覽提供者名稱。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, and the default site map provider for the site is used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，而且會使用站台的預設網站導覽提供者。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to site map data that is provided by an <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> object other than the default provider.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>網站導覽資料所提供的控制項<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>預設提供者以外的物件。

trans-unit.source: The Web.config file makes a custom <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> object available to the `SiteMapDataSource` control:
trans-unit.target: Web.config 檔案可讓自訂<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>物件可用來`SiteMapDataSource`控制項：

trans-unit.source: The code for the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` class that this Web.config file example references can be found in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`類別，這個 Web.config 檔案的範例參考位於<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: If you use the Visual Basic example, the namespace ends in "VB" instead of "CS".
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 Visual Basic 範例，命名空間會在"VB"，而不是"CS"結束。

trans-unit.source: You can also find sample content for the "text.txt" site map file in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以尋找範例內容中的"text.txt 「 站台對應檔案<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The `AsciiTextProvider` is not the default provider for the site, which (in this case) remains the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: `AsciiTextProvider`不是預設的提供者站台 （在此情況下） 依然<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control is set to the name of a custom site map provider, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> binds to the corresponding site map data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項設定為自訂網站地圖提供者的名稱和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>資料對應至對應的站台的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the site map node tree is retrieved using the node that represents the current page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出網站導覽節點樹是否使用表示目前頁面的節點所擷取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果所擷取的節點樹相對於目前的頁面，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property is evaluated during calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>呼叫期間會評估屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetView%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法，以協助您判斷哪一個站台對應節點，以用來作為起點指向建置節點樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties are mutually exclusive — if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property, ensure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性互斥 — 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性，請確認<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從開始節點位移的正整數或負整數，判斷資料來源控制項所公開的根階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> is the same as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 所公開的根階層架構與開始節點相同。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The negative or positive integer value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control.
trans-unit.target: 負數或正數的整數值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>識別層級向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始的節點數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>位移開始節點子樹狀結構的屬性公開資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果識別的開始節點是代表目前要求的頁面中，節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為負的數字-*n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是上階節點*n*上識別階層的層級開始節點。

trans-unit.source: If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 如果值*n*大於在階層樹狀結構的樹狀子目錄的起始節點的祖系層級數目是站台對應階層的根節點。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為正數 +*n*，公開的樹狀子目錄的開始節點是子節點*n*下所識別的起始節點層級。

trans-unit.source: Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 因為階層中可能存在多個分支的子節點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>嘗試解析直接在識別的開始節點與代表目前要求的頁面上，如果可能的節點之間的路徑上的子節點。

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果節點，表示目前要求的頁面不是識別開始節點的值的子樹中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前要求的頁面節點是否小於*n*下識別開始節點目前要求的頁面節點層級做開始節點。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the effect of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的效果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example consists of several ASP.NET pages, a master page, master page section, and a Web.sitemap file.
trans-unit.target: 此範例是由數個 ASP.NET 網頁、 主版頁面、 主版頁面區段和 Web.sitemap 檔案所組成。

trans-unit.source: The Web.sitemap file defines the hierarchical structure of the site.
trans-unit.target: Web.sitemap 檔案定義站台的階層式結構。

trans-unit.source: For this code example, it defines a number of pages identified by unique URLs, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and B.aspx, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼範例，它會定義頁數，唯一的 Url，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx 和 B.aspx，所識別的如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The Site.master page contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> controls inside a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: Site.master 頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>內控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentPlaceHolder>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It identifies the starting node of the exposed hierarchy as Default.aspx, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它會識別公開為 Default.aspx 中，階層的開始節點使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The Site.master file is used by the Default.aspx page only.
trans-unit.target: Site.master 檔會使用 Default.aspx 頁面。

trans-unit.source: All other pages, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and so on, use the Section.master master page.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他頁面，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx，依此類推，使用 Section.master 主版頁面。

trans-unit.source: This master page is very similar to Site.master, however it contains several <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> controls that you can experiment with.
trans-unit.target: 此主版頁面為 Site.master，非常類似，不過它包含數個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>可以試驗的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control that displays site map data is initially bound to `SiteMapDataSource1`, which specifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> of 1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>一開始顯示網站導覽資料控制項繫結至`SiteMapDataSource1`，以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>為 1。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the parent node of the currently requested page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 這表示會顯示目前要求的頁面的父節點。

trans-unit.source: If you view page 1.aspx, the hierarchy displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> is A, 1, 2.
trans-unit.target: 如果您檢視頁面 1.aspx 時，所顯示階層<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>是 A、 1、 2。

trans-unit.source: However, if you view page 4.aspx, the hierarchy is B, 3, 4.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您檢視頁面 4.aspx，階層是 B，3，4。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> to `SiteMapDataSource2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays site map data differently.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>至`SiteMapDataSource2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制項會以不同的方式顯示網站地圖資料。

trans-unit.source: When you use `SiteMapDataSource2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property is set to `true`, which means that the site map data is displayed relative to the currently requested page and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A> property is set to -1, indicating that one level of child nodes is displayed, when possible.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用`SiteMapDataSource2`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>屬性設定為`true`，這表示網站導覽資料會顯示相對於目前要求的頁面和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeOffset%2A>屬性設定為-1，指出子節點的一個層級顯示，可能的話。

trans-unit.source: When you view the A.aspx page, the hierarchy that is displayed is the hierarchy of the current level, including all siblings, such as B and C. When you view 1.aspx, the parent nodes are no longer displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當您檢視 [A.aspx] 頁面上時，會顯示在階層是階層的目前層級，包括所有同層級，例如 B 和 c。當您檢視 1.aspx 時，不再顯示父節點。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates one of the ASP.NET pages you can use with the other components of this code example.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範您可以使用這個程式碼範例中的其他元件的 ASP.NET 網頁的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a node in the site map that the data source then uses as a reference point to retrieve nodes from a hierarchical site map.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定網站導覽中的節點，然後資料來源會使用該節點做為參考點，從階層式網站導覽擷取節點。

trans-unit.source: The URL of a node in the site map.
trans-unit.target: 網站導覽中的節點 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> retrieves the identified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> and any child nodes from the site map.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 會從網站導覽中擷取所識別的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> 及任何子節點。

trans-unit.source: The default is an <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>屬性繫結至網站導覽資料，並提供其站台對應階層中指定的開始節點為基礎的檢視。

trans-unit.source: By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，開始的節點就是，在階層的根節點，但是您可以設定的開始節點至任何節點並<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性或 set<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartFromCurrentNode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性儲存在檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A> property and bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl%2A>屬性和繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection is a collection of <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示集合是否為 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> is associated with one or more <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> objects; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 與一個或多個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> 物件關聯，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.
trans-unit.target: 可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The URL of the root node of the view.
trans-unit.target: 檢視之根節點的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> helper object on the site map data, according to the starting node identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> property or its child, if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 網站導覽資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> Helper 物件，根據 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.StartingNodeUrl" /> 屬性所識別的開始節點而定，如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.ShowStartingNode" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，則為其子系。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: No <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> is configured or available for the site.
trans-unit.target: 此站台未設定或者沒有可用的 <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetViewNames" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetViewNames" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of named <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 由與 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 相關的具名 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceView" /> 物件組成的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> supports only one named view, the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames" /> returns a collection containing one element set to <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 由於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource" /> 僅支援單一具名檢視，因此 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.GetViewNames" /> 會傳回含有將某個項目設為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 的集合。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。
